text: NTC Tower, or National Telecommunications Corporation Tower is a building in Khartoum, Sudan. The 29 story building was completed in 2009, construction having begun in 2005. http://skyscraperpage.com/cities/?buildingID=76497 Skycraper Page The contractor is the Turkish company AINA International.http://www.ntcproject.ainainternational.com AINA Page ==See also== *Skyscraper design and construction *List of tallest buildings in Africa ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Khartoum Category:Residential buildings completed in 2009
title: NTC Tower
